abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column compares particular deal to boxing match.
lead_paragraph: Bridge deals, though, can resemble a boxing match. One side tries to deliver the telling blow, when the other sidesteps and lands the lethal counterpunch.

headline.main: How a Bridge Deal Can Resemble a Boxing Match
headline.print_headline: How a Bridge Deal Can Resemble a Boxing Match
